B7C.F.summary: d'Amico International Shipping S.A., through its subsidiaries, operates as a marine transportation company worldwide. The company primarily transports refined petroleum products and vegetable oil through various double-hulled vessels. It serves oil companies and trading houses. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated a fleet of approximately 40.0 vessels. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg. d'Amico International Shipping S.A. is a subsidiary of d'Amico International S.A.
